title: [Ta'Vaalor, Amaranth Bridge]
description: The thick limestone blocks of the bridge arc across the river, arching higher as they approach the center of the Mistydeep's breadth.  Few travellers cross the bridge at this late hour.  Those who do hurry along the way, heads down and fleet of foot.

The thick limestone blocks of the bridge arc across the river, sweeping higher as they approach the center of the Mistydeep's breadth.  Throngs of travelers and merchants push across the bridge, many carrying boxes and trundling small wagons loaded with goods in their wake.

/mrt night;The thick limestone blocks of the bridge arc across the river, arching higher as they approach the center of the Mistydeep's breadth.  Few travelers cross the bridge at this late hour, and those who do hurry along the way, fleet of foot with their heads down.

The thick limestone blocks of the bridge arc across the river, arching higher as they approach the center of the Mistydeep's breadth.  Few travelers cross the bridge at this late hour, and those who do hurry along the way, fleet of foot with their heads down.
